trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Little Rock
There were no other sightings in Little Rock on or around January 10th 2007
Summary: a ball of white/yellow light, just appered out of nowhere, traveled straight lined and dissapeared, from were i looked like a softball size.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the car with my friend parker and his dad after i had went to his house to study for exams and we were driving and we saw a big ball of light traveling about a couple hundred miles per hour in a straight line with a little bit of smoke like substance coming out of the back but it had like a light rainbow color to the smoke and we saw it and it just dissapeared out of nowhere and we had no sight of it after that. P.S. it didn't look like anything like fire works.
